sentences.sentence: Immature woman will always check a man's cellphone text messages only to gey herself angry.
sentences.translation: 不成熟的女人会时常看男人的手机短信，给自己惹火上身。

sentences.sentence: The reaction between Actual Maximum Yield (AMY) and Global Equilibrium Yield(GEY) in complex reaction systems are discussed.
sentences.translation: 本文讨论了复杂反应系统中实际最大产率与综合平衡产率之间的关系。
